name: Astral Breakers
description: Battle with a friend or against the computer in this cosmic smashing action drop puzzle game as you assert your zodiac sign for galactic dominance! The Zodiac Constellations have gone berserk, and the cantankerous Kira the Star recruits you to help save the universe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i5 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i7 2.5Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space
